{"blocks":[{"key":"brtl8","text":"Under stirring adjust pH to 8 using NaOH","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6b8sc","text":"Add 60g of NaNO3 under vigorous stirring at 50°C until fully dissolved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3561b","text":"Cool solution to room temperature and add MilliQ water to 100 ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84g9o","text":"Add MilliQ water to 100 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96h8d","text":"Filter sterilize the solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f765p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c43o5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3mlvj","text":"Dissolve 0.224g EDTA Na2*2H2O  in 40 mL MilliQ water followed by 0.162g FeCl3·6H2O and leave the solution stirring over night","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f26sd","text":"Dissolve 3g MgSo4*7H2O in 15 ml MilliQ water and add it to the EDTA Na2*2H2O + FeCl3·6H2O solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9akst","text":"Add 40 ml of Micronutrient solution (See Section Micronutrient stock solution preparation) to this mix and fill to 100 ml using MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"evfve","text":"Filter sterilize the solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"em4o1","text":"Dissolve 1.6 g K2HPO4 in 40 ml of MilliQ water","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ev2gm","text":"Dissolve 0.52 g EDTA Na2*2H2O in the same solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f07ur","text":"Filter sterilize the solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31h3d","text":"Fill to 100 ml using MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bthsg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cp6i7","text":"Dissolve 8 g NaHCO3 in 80 ml MilliQ water","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bpsim","text":"Fill to 100 ml using MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"11jul","text":"Filter sterilize the solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7vcq","text":"Add trace metal salts in the order they are listed to 100 ml of MilliQ water and wait for complete dissolution between each addition","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"61fbv","text":"Filter sterilize the solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ff1lk","text":"Dissolve 8.2 g of rhamnose in 40 ml MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"97b12","text":"Add MilliQ water to 50ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2h95s","text":"Filter sterilize the solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5k3j5","text":"Dissolve 25 mg CuS04*5H20 in 8 ml MiliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"gvta","text":"Add to 10 ml using MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e89pc","text":"Dilute 10 µl of this solution in 9.99 ml MilliQ water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5ot29","text":"Filter sterilize the solution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1ib6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58l3d","text":"BG-11 is split into four stock solutions such that incompatible (i.e. because of low solubility) compounds at high concentration are avoided. Additionally, a minimal amount of HEPES buffer is added to ensure the same starting pH of the cultures.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffasg","text":"The final medium is prepared by adding buffer and each stock solution to 500 ml autoclaved water measuring cylinder and filling it to a total of 1 liter. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":154}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: BG11_and_inducer_preparation
